item.title: iPhone 18 延期至 2027 年春季，折叠屏机型或受影响
item.guid: iPhone-18-延期至-2027-年春季，折叠屏机型或受影响
item.description:
According to MacRumors, Japan's Mizuho Securities recently stated that Apple plans to postpone the launch of the iPhone 18 until spring 2027, coinciding with the debut of the iPhone 18e. 据 MacRumors 报道，日本瑞穗证券近日表示，苹果计划将 iPhone 18 的发布时间推迟至 2027 年春季，与 iPhone 18e 同期亮相。

Meanwhile, the iPhone Air 2nd generation, iPhone 18 Pro, and iPhone 18 Pro Max are still expected to be released next autumn. If the foldable iPhone is not delayed, it might also debut at the same time. 而 iPhone Air 二代、iPhone 18 Pro 和 iPhone 18 Pro Max 仍预计在明年秋季发布，若折叠屏 iPhone 未延期，也可能同期登场。

However, according to Mizuho Securities, the launch of Apple's first foldable iPhone might also be postponed until 2027. The agency points out that the delay may be related to Apple's extended decision-making cycle on key design elements such as hinges. 不过，据瑞穗证券消息，苹果首款折叠屏 iPhone 的发布也可能推迟至 2027 年。该机构指出，延期原因或与苹果在铰链等关键设计元素上的决策周期延长有关。

The report indicates that this foldable iPhone is expected to feature a 7.58-inch internal screen and a 5.38-inch external screen. The originally planned display panel production has been reduced from 13 million units to 9 million units. If Apple insists on a 2026 release, the first-year complete machine production might be 5 to 7 million units less than the panel production. 报道显示，这款折叠屏 iPhone 预计配备 7.58 英寸内屏和 5.38 英寸外屏。原计划的显示面板产量已从 1300 万片下调至 900 万片。若苹果坚持在 2026 年发布，首年整机产量可能比面板产量少 500 万至 700 万台。

Looking further ahead, Apple is developing new technologies for the iPhone 19 series, positioning it as a special edition for the iPhone's 20th anniversary. 更远期来看，苹果正为 iPhone 19 系列开发新技术，并将其定位为 iPhone 诞生 20 周年的特别版本。

Meanwhile, the second-generation foldable iPhone is expected to launch in autumn 2027, with a price possibly lower than the first-generation product. On the supply chain front, R&D work for an 18.9-inch foldable MacBook has restarted, with an expected release as early as 2028 to 2029. 同时，第二代折叠屏 iPhone 预计在 2027 年秋季推出，售价或将低于首代产品。供应链方面，18.9 英寸折叠屏 MacBook 的研发工作已重新启动，预计最早在 2028 至 2029 年间发布。

Additionally, MacRumors reported on the same day that due to Samsung's LPDDR5X chips, mass-produced from 2024, only offering 12GB and 16GB specifications, the iPhone 18 series may come standard with 12GB RAM across all models. 此外，MacRumors 同日报道称，由于三星自 2024 年起量产的 LPDDR5X 芯片仅提供 12GB 与 16GB 两种规格，iPhone 18 系列或将全系标配 12GB RAM。

item.title: 苹果或在自带地图加入广告
item.guid: 苹果或在自带地图加入广告
item.description:
Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman recently reported in his Power On column that Apple is pushing forward with plans to introduce ads into its native Maps app, with the earliest launch expected next year. 彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 日前在 Power On 栏目报道称，苹果公司正推进在自带的地图 App 中引入广告的计划，最快将于明年上线。

This feature will allow restaurants and other businesses to pay for their information to be more prominently displayed in app search results. 该功能将允许餐厅及其他商家付费，使其信息在应用搜索结果中获得更突出展示。

The report points out that this model is similar to search ads within the App Store, where developers can pay to have their apps gain priority exposure under specific keywords. Apple plans to adopt a more optimized interface design in the Maps app and leverage AI technology to enhance the relevance and utility of results. 报道指出，这一模式与 App Store 内的搜索广告类似，开发者可通过付费方式让应用在特定关键词下获得优先曝光。苹果计划在地图 App 中采用更优化的界面设计，并借助 AI 技术提升结果的相关性与实用性。

item.title: 高通发布 AI 芯片，最快明年上市
item.guid: 高通发布-AI-芯片，最快明年上市
item.description:
According to Reuters, Qualcomm today announced the launch of two AI chips for data centers, AI200 and AI250, planned for commercial release in 2026 and 2027, respectively. Following the announcement, Qualcomm's stock price closed up 11% on the day, reaching a 52-week high. 据路透社报道，今天，高通宣布推出两款面向数据中心的人工智能芯片 AI200 与 AI250，计划分别于 2026 和 2027 年商业化上市。消息公布后，高通股价当日收涨 11%，创下 52 周新高。

Qualcomm stated that the new chips feature higher memory capacity and inference performance, support mainstream AI frameworks and tools, and emphasized their cost advantages for enterprises. Concurrently, the company also released a complete rack solution based on these chips, further transitioning towards becoming a data center system supplier. 高通表示，新芯片具备更高的内存容量和推理性能，支持主流 AI 框架与工具，并强调可为企业带来成本优势。与此同时，公司还发布了基于该芯片的整机机架方案，进一步向数据中心系统供应商转型。

Industry analysis suggests that Qualcomm's move aims to break free from the stagnation in the smartphone market and directly compete with Nvidia and AMD in the AI data center sector. 业内分析认为，高通此举意在摆脱智能手机市场增长停滞的局面，并与英伟达和 AMD 在 AI 数据中心领域展开直接竞争。

However, Nvidia's leading position in performance and ecosystem, along with the high cost for customers to switch suppliers, still poses challenges for new entrants. 然而，英伟达在性能与生态上的领先地位，以及客户更换供应商的高成本，仍对新入局者构成挑战。

Additionally, Qualcomm revealed that Humain, a startup backed by Saudi Arabia's sovereign wealth fund, will deploy 200 megawatts of Qualcomm AI racks starting in 2026. 此外，高通透露，沙特主权财富基金支持的初创公司 Humain 将自 2026 年起部署 200 兆瓦规模的高通 AI 机架。

item.title: 微信桌面端灰度上线「元宝总结」功能
item.guid: 微信桌面端灰度上线「元宝总结」功能
item.description:
iFanr has learned that WeChat has soft-launched the 'Yuanbao Summarizes Official Account Articles' feature on its Mac and Windows clients. This feature appears at the top of the official account article browser; after a user clicks it, Yuanbao will automatically generate a 'Summarize this article' prompt in a new tab and output the article's key points. 爱范儿获悉，微信已在 Mac 与 Windows 客户端灰度上线「元宝总结公众号文章」功能。该功能出现在公众号文章浏览器顶部，用户点击后，元宝会在新标签页中自动生成「总结这篇文章」的提示词，并输出文章关键要点。

In addition to the top entry point, users can also see a 'Summarize' button in the secondary menu when right-clicking an article in the client. Tests show that both Mac and Windows clients now support this feature, and some users can experience it directly. 除顶部入口外，用户在客户端右键选中文章时，也可在二级菜单中看到「总结」按钮。实测显示，Mac 与 Windows 客户端均已支持该功能，部分用户可直接体验。

item.title: BBC 最新调研显示 AI 助手新闻回答近半数存在误导风险
item.guid: BBC-最新调研显示-AI-助手新闻回答近半数存在误导风险
item.description:
The European Broadcasting Union (EBU) and BBC recently jointly released the 'News Integrity and AI Assistant Toolkit,' pointing out that in research conducted between June and July 2025, 22 public media organizations tested over 3,000 news responses from AI assistants across 18 countries and 14 languages, with approximately 45% containing significant issues that could mislead users . 欧洲广播联盟（EBU）与 BBC 近日联合发布《新闻完整性与 AI 助手工具包》，指出在 2025 年 6 月至 7 月期间的研究中，22 家公共媒体机构在 18 个国家、14 种语言环境下测试了超过 3,000 条 AI 助手的新闻回答， 其中约 45% 存在重大问题，可能对用户造成误导 。

The report shows that the problems are systemic, covering mainstream assistants such as ChatGPT, Copilot, Perplexity, and Google Gemini, primarily focusing on four areas: 报告显示，问题具有系统性，涵盖 ChatGPT、Copilot、Perplexity 与 Google Gemini 等主流助手，主要集中在四个方面：

    Accuracy: including fabricated facts, outdated information, incorrect causal relationships, etc.;

    Context: omitting key information or viewpoints, leading to one-sided answers;

    Distinction between fact and opinion: failure to clearly label opinions or incorrect attribution;

    Source transparency: lack of reliable sources, or citation of fabricated, outdated, or irrelevant links.

The toolkit also proposes four standards for 'good answers': accurate information, provision of necessary context, distinction between facts and opinions, and clear, verifiable sources. 工具包还提出了「好回答」的四大标准：信息准确、提供必要上下文、区分事实与观点、来源清晰可验证。

At the same time, the report also summarized common failure modes, such as fabricated quotes, logical errors, excessive pandering to user queries (sycophancy), refusal to answer legitimate news questions, and inappropriate editorialization tendencies. 同时，报告还总结了常见失败模式，如虚构引语、逻辑错误、过度迎合用户提问（sycophancy）、拒绝回答合法新闻问题，以及不当的编辑化倾向。

BBC and EBU emphasized that as the role of AI tools in news acquisition grows, ensuring that responses meet journalistic professional standards is crucial. The toolkit aims to provide reference for technology companies, media organizations, researchers, and the public to promote transparency and credibility of AI in the news domain. BBC 与 EBU 强调，随着 AI 工具在新闻获取中的作用日益增强，确保回答符合新闻专业标准至关重要。该工具包旨在为科技公司、媒体机构、研究者及公众提供参考，以推动 AI 在新闻领域的透明度与可信度。

📖 Full report: https://www.bbc.co.uk/aboutthebbc/documents/news-integrity-in-ai-assistants-toolkit.pdf 📖 报告全文： https://www.bbc.co.uk/aboutthebbc/documents/news-integrity-in-ai-assistants-toolkit.pdf

item.title: 前阿里高管出任山姆中国区总裁
item.guid: 前阿里高管出任山姆中国区总裁
item.description:
According to Xin Huanghe, Walmart confirmed yesterday that Liu Peng, former Alibaba executive, has officially joined Walmart China and will serve as the President of Sam's Club. Former acting President of Sam's Club, Jane Ewing, will conclude her expatriate assignment at the end of the year and return to Walmart headquarters. 据新黄河报道，昨天沃尔玛方面确认，前阿里巴巴高管刘鹏正式加入沃尔玛中国，并出任山姆会员店业态总裁。原代理业态总裁 Jane Ewing 将于年底结束外派，返回沃尔玛总部。

Liu Peng previously held several key positions at Alibaba Group, including General Manager of Tmall Global, President of Tmall Import & Export Business, Vice President of Alibaba Group and President of B2C Retail Business Group, and President of Taotian Group's Brand Business Development Center. 刘鹏曾在阿里巴巴集团担任多个核心职务，包括天猫国际总经理、天猫进出口业务总裁、阿里巴巴集团副总裁兼 B2C 零售事业群总裁，以及淘天集团品牌业务发展中心总裁。

Walmart stated that it values his experience in global brand localization strategies and insights into Chinese consumers. 沃尔玛方面表示，看重其在全球品牌本地化策略和中国消费者洞察方面的经验。

Walmart believes that Liu Peng's international perspective and omnichannel experience will help drive the strategic upgrade of Sam's Club China, further solidify the "member first" philosophy, and accelerate digital transformation and technological innovation. 沃尔玛认为，刘鹏的国际化视野与全渠道经验将有助于推动山姆中国的战略升级，进一步夯实「会员第一」理念，并加速数字化转型与科技创新。

Public data shows that in fiscal year 2025, Walmart China's net sales were approximately $20.3 billion (about 144.5 billion RMB), with Sam's Club generally believed to contribute over two-thirds of this. Currently, Sam's Club has opened nearly 60 stores in over 30 cities, with approximately 5 more expected to open by the end of this year. 公开数据显示，2025 财年，沃尔玛中国净销售额约为 203 亿美元（约合人民币 1445 亿元），其中山姆会员店贡献被普遍认为超过三分之二。目前，山姆已在 30 多个城市开设近 60 家门店，预计今年年底前还将新增约 5 家。

item.title: 通知延迟困扰 Pixel 用户，电池优化机制被指「元凶」
item.guid: 通知延迟困扰-Pixel-用户，电池优化机制被指「元凶」
item.description:
According to Android Authority, the notification delay issue on Google Pixel phones persists with the Pixel 10 series. Multiple users on Reddit have reported severe delays in receiving push notifications from apps like Google Home on their new devices, with some notifications only appearing in a batch after unlocking the phone. 据 Android Authority 报道，谷歌 Pixel 手机的通知延迟问题在 Pixel 10 系列上依然存在。多名用户在 Reddit 上反映，新设备在接收 Google Home 等应用的推送时出现严重延迟，部分通知甚至需要解锁手机后才会集中显示。

Users point out that the delay issue is not new, with similar situations observed from the Pixel 4 to Pixel 9 series. The core reason is believed to be related to Android's "Doze" and "App Standby" features. These battery optimization mechanisms extend standby time by restricting background network and CPU activity, but they can also delay app push notifications. 用户指出，延迟问题并非首次出现，从 Pixel 4 到 Pixel 9 系列均有类似情况。核心原因被认为与 Android 的「Doze」及「App Standby」功能相关。这些电池优化机制通过限制后台网络和 CPU 活动来延长待机时间，但同时也可能推迟应用的推送通知。

Some users have attempted to disable the Doze feature via ADB commands to resolve the issue, but this method requires computer operation and needs to be reconfigured after each restart, making it difficult to be a universal solution. Despite years of complaints, Google has not yet provided an official fix. 部分用户尝试通过 ADB 命令禁用 Doze 功能以解决问题，但该方法需要电脑操作且每次重启后需重复设置，难以成为普遍解决方案。尽管相关投诉已持续多年，谷歌目前尚未提供官方修复措施。

One user stated: "Since the Pixel 10 Pro was released, I've barely received notifications on time. Google Home camera alerts and baby monitor alerts are always delayed, only popping up all at once after unlocking the phone." Another user commented: "It's not just Google Home; even SMS notifications only show up after unlocking." 有用户表示：「自 Pixel 10 Pro 上市以来，几乎无法及时收到通知。Google Home 的摄像头提醒和婴儿监控提醒总是延迟，解锁手机后才会一次性弹出。」另一位用户则称：「不仅是 Google Home，连短信通知也要解锁后才显示。」

This issue has been reported by users on Pixel 10, Pixel 9, Pixel 8, and earlier models, indicating it has become a long-standing systemic flaw in the Pixel series. For applications relying on instant alerts, such as home security or messaging services, notification delays have severely impacted the user experience. 这一问题在 Pixel 10、Pixel 9、Pixel 8 及更早机型上均有用户反馈，显示其已成为 Pixel 系列长期存在的系统性缺陷。对于依赖即时提醒的应用，如家庭安防或消息服务，通知延迟已严重影响使用体验。

item.title: 特斯拉「世界模拟器」首曝：1 天蒸馏 500 年驾驶经验
item.guid: 特斯拉「世界模拟器」首曝：1-天蒸馏-500-年驾驶经验
item.description:
According to Xinzhiyuan, Tesla officially released a "World Simulator" demonstration yesterday, showcasing its end-to-end neural network's ability to self-evolve in virtual environments. 据新智元报道，特斯拉昨日正式发布「世界模拟器」演示，展示其端到端神经网络在虚拟环境中自我进化的能力。

The official statement claims that the system can absorb the equivalent of 500 years of human driving experience in just one day and generate highly realistic driving scenarios for training and testing autonomous driving and the humanoid robot Optimus. 官方称，该系统可在 1 天内吸收相当于人类 500 年的驾驶经验，并生成高度逼真的驾驶场景，用于自动驾驶与人形机器人 Optimus 的训练与测试。

Ashok Elluswamy, head of Tesla's AI team, revealed in his ICCV 2025 keynote speech that the "World Simulator" can not only recreate real road conditions but also generate extreme or rare dangerous scenarios for closed-loop evaluation and adversarial testing. 特斯拉 AI 团队负责人 Ashok Elluswamy 在 ICCV 2025 主题演讲中透露，「世界模拟器」不仅能重现真实路况，还可创造极端或罕见的危险场景，用于闭环评估和对抗性测试。

This simulator shares the same neural network architecture as the autonomous driving system. Inputs include multi-camera footage, vehicle dynamic data, and navigation information, while outputs directly control steering wheel angle and accelerator/brake pressure. 这一模拟器与自动驾驶系统共享同一神经网络架构，输入包括多摄像头画面、车辆动态数据和导航信息，输出则直接为方向盘转角与油门/刹车力度。

Compared to traditional "modular" solutions, Tesla adheres to an "end-to-end" approach, emphasizing learning implicit value judgments through large-scale data, reducing information loss, and improving generalization capabilities for long-tail problems. The amount of driving data generated by its fleet daily is equivalent to hundreds of years of human driving experience, dubbed "Niagara Falls of data." 与传统「模块化」方案相比，特斯拉坚持「端到端」路线，强调通过大规模数据学习隐式价值判断，减少信息损耗，并提升对长尾问题的泛化能力。其车队每天产生的驾驶数据量，相当于人类数百年的驾驶经验，被称为「尼亚加拉瀑布般的数据」。

Furthermore, Tesla has introduced "Generative Gaussian Splatting" technology to achieve high-fidelity 3D scene reconstruction and partially applied natural language explanation features in FSD v14.x to enhance system interpretability. 此外，特斯拉还引入「生成式高斯泼溅」技术，实现高保真 3D 场景重建，并在 FSD v14.x 中部分应用自然语言解释功能，提升系统可解释性。

item.title: 夏普将入局电动车市场，发布「LDK+」概念车
item.guid: 夏普将入局电动车市场，发布「LDK+」概念车
item.description:
According to DIGITIMES, Sharp Corporation announced on October 24 that it will officially enter the Japanese electric vehicle (EV) market in fiscal year 2027. 据 DIGITIMES 报道，夏普公司于 10 月 24 日宣布，将在 2027 财年、正式进入日本电动汽车（EV）市场。

At the press conference, Sharp showcased its second-generation concept car, "LDK+", emphasizing its positioning as a new type of mobility tool that integrates home life, energy systems, and artificial intelligence. 夏普在发布会上展示了第二代概念车「LDK+」，强调其定位为融合家庭生活、能源系统与人工智能的新型移动工具。

Mototaka Taneya, the company's Executive Director and CTO, stated that the model will integrate Sharp's long-standing expertise in AI, home appliances, and energy solutions to create a "unique EV that traditional car manufacturers cannot replicate." 公司执行董事兼首席技术官种谷元隆表示，该车型将整合夏普在 AI、家电与能源解决方案方面的长期积累，打造「传统车企无法复制的独特 EV」。

"LDK+" will make its public debut at the Japan Mobility Show, held from October 29 to November 9, 2025, at Tokyo Big Sight. The concept was first announced in September 2024, with the initial design emphasizing "the car as another room in the home," achieving seamless integration with residences through IoT and energy systems. 「LDK+」将在 2025 年 10 月 29 日至 11 月 9 日于东京国际展示场举办的日本移动出行展上首次公开亮相。该概念最早于 2024 年 9 月发布，初代设计强调「汽车即家庭的另一间房间」，通过 IoT 与能源系统实现与住宅的无缝连接。

The new generation model adopts Foxconn's "Model A" platform, positioned as a compact multi-purpose van, expected to accommodate 5 passengers with a range of approximately 300 to 400 kilometers. Final performance parameters have not yet been announced. 新一代车型采用富士康「Model A」平台，定位为紧凑型多功能厢式车，预计可容纳 5 名乘客，续航里程约 300 至 400 公里，最终性能参数尚未公布。

Sharp plans to simultaneously launch the model for consumer and enterprise markets in 2027. In addition to retail channels, it will also explore corporate fleets and partnerships with traditional dealers. The company believes that Japan's EV penetration rate is still low, indicating significant growth potential in the market. 夏普计划在 2027 年面向消费与企业市场同步推出该车型，除零售渠道外，还将探索企业车队及传统经销商合作。公司认为，日本 EV 渗透率仍处低位，市场存在较大增长空间。

Mototaka Taneya pointed out that future cars should no longer be idle 95% of the time but should become an organic part of family and urban life. 种谷元隆指出，未来汽车不应再有 95% 的时间处于闲置状态，而应成为家庭与城市生活的有机组成部分。

item.title: 新能源车购置税收紧，超 10 家车企「自掏腰包」稳订单
item.guid: 新能源车购置税收紧，超-10-家车企「自掏腰包」稳订单
item.description:
According to Cailian Press, as the new energy vehicle purchase tax exemption policy is about to tighten, multiple car manufacturers are intensively launching year-end subsidy programs to stabilize orders and alleviate the pressure of car purchase costs for consumers. 据财联社报道，在新能源汽车购置税减免政策即将收紧之际，多家车企密集推出跨年补贴方案，以稳定订单并缓解消费者购车成本压力。

Recently, Chery Automobile announced that it will fully subsidize eligible users for the difference arising from the adjustment of the purchase tax policy, with a maximum subsidy of no more than 15,000 yuan per vehicle, covering new energy models from brands such as Chery, Zongheng, Exeed, Jetour, and iCAR. 日前，奇瑞汽车宣布将对符合条件的用户全额补贴因购置税政策调整产生的差额，单车最高补贴金额不超过 1.5 万元，覆盖奇瑞、纵横、星途、捷途、iCAR 等品牌的新能源车型。

According to incomplete statistics, more than 10 car manufacturers have already launched similar initiatives, including Zeekr, IM Motors, Nio, Li Auto, Luxeed, Avatr, and AITO. Xiaomi Auto also recently announced a "purchase tax guarantee" plan, with an estimated investment of over 2 billion yuan, to protect car owners' rights. 据不完全统计，目前已有超过 10 家车企推出类似举措，包括极氪、智己、蔚来、理想、智界、尊界、问界等。小米汽车也在近日宣布「购置税兜底」方案，预计投入资金超过 20 亿元，以保障车主权益。

The policy background shows that new energy vehicles first enjoyed purchase tax exemption benefits starting in 2014, and the policy has been extended multiple times. 政策背景显示，2014 年起新能源汽车首次享受免征购置税优惠，政策多次延续。

According to the announcement issued by the Ministry of Finance and other departments in 2023, from January 1, 2026, until the end of 2027, the purchase tax for new energy vehicles will be halved, with a tax reduction of no more than 15,000 yuan per vehicle. This means that a new energy vehicle priced at 300,000 yuan purchased this year can enjoy full tax exemption, while starting next year, a purchase tax of 15,000 yuan will be required . 根据 2023 年财政部等部门发布的公告，自 2026 年 1 月 1 日起至 2027 年底，新能源汽车购置税将减半征收，每辆车减税额不超过 1.5 万元。这意味着， 一辆售价 30 万元的新能源车在今年购入可享受全额免税，而明年起则需缴纳 1.5 万元购置税 。

item.title: 谷歌推出 Earth AI 新模型，强化地理空间推理能力
item.guid: 谷歌推出-Earth-AI-新模型，强化地理空间推理能力
item.description:
Recently, Google announced the expansion of its "Earth AI" capabilities on Google Earth and Google Cloud platforms, introducing a new generation of geospatial AI models and inference agents. This system combines foundational models with multimodal reasoning, aiming to provide actionable recommendations for complex global issues. 日前，谷歌宣布在 Google Earth 和 Google Cloud 平台扩展其「Earth AI」能力，推出新一代地理空间 AI 模型与推理智能体。该系统结合基础模型与多模态推理，旨在为复杂的全球性问题提供可行的建议。

Google stated that the core of Earth AI lies in combining multi-domain models for imagery, population, and environment with inference agents. 谷歌表示，Earth AI 的核心在于将影像、人口与环境等多领域模型与推理 Agent 结合。

Agents can break down natural language questions into multi-step plans, invoke different models and geospatial tools, and integrate results to generate comprehensive answers. For example, when predicting hurricane landfalls and assessing affected communities, the system can simultaneously call upon weather forecasts, population dynamics, and satellite imagery to identify critical infrastructure. Agent 可将自然语言问题分解为多步计划，调用不同模型与地理空间工具，并融合结果生成整体答案。例如，在预测飓风登陆及评估受影响社区时，系统可同时调用天气预测、人口动态与卫星影像识别关键基础设施。

According to the introduction, this update includes two major new models: 据介绍，此次更新包括两大新模型：

  • Image Foundation Model: Supports natural language queries for satellite images, improving text retrieval accuracy by over 16% and more than doubling baseline accuracy in zero-shot object detection; 影像基础模型：支持自然语言查询卫星图像，提升超过 16% 的文本检索准确率，并在零样本目标检测中将基线精度提升一倍以上；
  • Population Dynamics Model: Covers 17 countries, providing monthly updated embedding vectors to capture changes in human activity. In independent research, this model improved the R² metric for long-term dengue fever prediction in Brazil from 0.456 to 0.656. 人口动态模型：覆盖 17 个国家，提供月度更新的嵌入向量，用于捕捉人类活动变化。在独立研究中，该模型将巴西登革热长期预测的 R² 指标从 0.456 提升至 0.656。

Furthermore, Google emphasizes the predictive power of multi-model fusion. For example, by combining population dynamics with geomorphological features, the average prediction accuracy for the U.S. Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) National Risk Index improved by 11%, with tornado risk prediction increasing by 25% and riverine flood risk by 17%. 此外，Google 强调多模型融合的预测能力。例如，将人口动态与地貌特征结合后，对美国联邦紧急事务管理署（FEMA）国家风险指数的预测准确率平均提升 11%，其中龙卷风风险预测提升 25%，河流洪水风险提升 17%。

In evaluations, Earth AI's geospatial inference agent achieved an overall accuracy of 0.82 in question-answering benchmarks, significantly outperforming Gemini 2.5 Pro's 0.50 and Gemini 2.5 Flash's 0.39. 在评估中，Earth AI 的地理空间推理代理在问答基准测试中取得 0.82 的整体准确率，显著优于 Gemini 2.5 Pro 的 0.50 和 Gemini 2.5 Flash 的 0.39。

Currently, Earth AI is being used by organizations such as UN Global Pulse and GiveDirectly for disaster response and public health research, and has attracted enterprise users including Public Storage, CARTO, and Visiona Space Technology. 目前，Earth AI 已被联合国 Global Pulse、GiveDirectly 等组织用于灾害响应与公共健康研究，并吸引了包括 Public Storage、CARTO 和 Visiona Space Technology 在内的企业用户。

item.title: 双十一霸榜助力，影石前三季度营收突破 66 亿元
item.guid: 双十一霸榜助力，影石前三季度营收突破-66-亿元
item.description:
Insta360 (688775.SH) released its Q3 2025 financial report yesterday evening. Data shows that the company achieved operating revenue of 2.94 billion yuan in the third quarter, a year-on-year increase of 92.64%; cumulative revenue for the first three quarters reached 6.611 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 67.18%, continuing its high-speed growth trend. 影石创新（688775.SH）于昨天晚间发布 2025 年第三季度财报。数据显示，公司第三季度实现营业收入 29.40 亿元，同比增长 92.64%；前三季度累计营收达 66.11 亿元，同比增长 67.18%，延续高速增长态势。

In terms of market performance, Insta360 topped multiple sales charts during the Double Eleven shopping festival with its core categories such as action cameras and panoramic cameras, demonstrating strong product competitiveness and user loyalty. Concurrently, Insta360's first flagship store in Hong Kong opened the day before yesterday, attracting a large crowd. 在市场表现方面，影石在双十一销售榜单中凭借运动相机、全景相机等核心品类实现多榜夺冠，展现出较强的产品竞争力与用户粘性。与此同时，影石 Insta360 首家香港旗舰店于前天开业，现场人气火爆。

Regarding R&D investment, Insta360's cumulative R&D expenditure in the first three quarters has exceeded 1 billion yuan, with 524 million yuan invested in the third quarter, a year-on-year increase of 164.81%. Affected by this, the net profit attributable to shareholders of listed companies in the third quarter was 272 million yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 15.9%. If strategic investments are excluded, the profit indicators would be better than the same period last year. 研发投入方面，影石前三季度累计研发支出已超 10 亿元，其中第三季度投入 5.24 亿元，同比增长 164.81%。受此影响，第三季度归属于上市公司股东的净利润为 2.72 亿元，同比下降 15.9%。若剔除战略性投入，利润指标则优于去年同期。

It is worth noting that "Yingling Antigravity," the world's first panoramic drone jointly incubated by Insta360 and a third party, has entered the final stage of public beta testing and has been selected for Time Magazine's "Best Inventions of 2025" list. The company expects the product to be test-marketed in some regional markets in the fourth quarter. 值得关注的是，影石与第三方联合孵化的全球首款全景无人机「影翎 Antigravity」已进入公测收尾阶段，并入选《时代》杂志「2025 年度最佳发明」榜单。公司预计该产品将在第四季度部分区域市场试售。

At the industry level, data from Huajing Industrial Research Institute shows that the CR3 of the global smart imaging equipment industry reached 78.9% in 2024. Insta360's market share has increased from 28.4% in 2023 to 35.6% in 2024, becoming the fastest-growing leading enterprise. 行业层面，华经产业研究院数据显示，2024 年全球智能影像设备行业 CR3 达 78.9%。影石市场份额已由 2023 年的 28.4% 提升至 2024 年的 35.6%，成为增长最快的头部企业。

item.title: 前天猫精灵总裁创业：运动可穿戴 + Agent 智能体切入通用智能
item.guid: 前天猫精灵总裁创业：运动可穿戴-+-Agent-智能体切入通用智能
item.description:
According to 36Kr, Peng Chao, former Vice President of Alibaba Group and President of Tmall Genie, recently founded a new company, "Yunjue Technology," and plans to enter the general intelligence track through sports AI hardware. 据 36 氪报道，前阿里巴巴集团副总裁、天猫精灵总裁彭超已于近日创立新公司「云玦科技」，并计划通过运动 AI 硬件切入通用智能赛道。

The project launched in mid-October, with its first product positioned as a combination of sports wearables and Agent intelligent entities. It aims to enable AI to perform roles such as tracking, planning, analysis, and execution in high-speed, high-frequency sports scenarios, and to possess self-evolution capabilities, with future potential for migration to broader physical spaces. 该项目于 10 月中旬启动，首款产品定位为运动可穿戴设备与 Agent 智能体的结合，旨在让 AI 在高速、高频运动场景中承担跟踪、规划、分析和执行等角色，并具备自进化能力，未来可迁移至更广泛的物理空间。

Insiders reveal that "Yunjue Technology"'s product form is still under design, but the direction is not a single piece of hardware, but rather "a product portfolio." This approach aligns with the trend of AI large models in the Agentic use direction since 2025, evolving from passively responding to instructions to actively planning and executing complex tasks. With the maturation of small-parameter inference models (SLM), AI is gradually transforming from a tool into an assistant. 知情人士透露，「云玦科技」的产品形态仍在设计中，但方向并非单一硬件，而是「一套产品组合」。这一思路契合 2025 年以来 AI 大模型在 Agentic use 方向的趋势，即从被动响应指令进化为主动规划和执行复杂任务。随着小参数量推理模型（SLM）的成熟，AI 正逐步从工具向助理转变。

Co-founder Qi Weizhen, a former joint Ph.D. student of Microsoft and USTC, proposed the MTP (Multi-token Prediction) architecture, which has been adopted by large models such as Deepseek V3 and Qwen-3-Next. He also has open-source experience in non-autoregressive generation acceleration, multimodal agents, and end-to-end inference acceleration. 联合创始人齐炜祯曾是微软与中科大联合培养博士，提出过 MTP（Multi-token Prediction）架构，该方法已被 Deepseek V3、Qwen-3-Next 等大模型采用。他在非自回归生成加速、多模态智能体和端到端推理加速方面也有开源经验。

Peng Chao previously had extensive experience in hardware and AIoT businesses at both Huawei and Alibaba. During his tenure at Alibaba, he led the introduction of the Damo Academy's large models to Tmall Genie and promoted the establishment of the group's smart interconnection business, achieving positive hardware gross profit and scaled software subscription revenue. 彭超此前在华为和阿里均有丰富的硬件与 AIoT 业务经验。在阿里任职期间，他主导将达摩院大模型引入天猫精灵，并推动集团智能互联业务的搭建，实现硬件毛利转正和软件订阅规模化收入。

item.title: 芯片巨头靠股票激励留人：提前离职将损失百万美元
item.guid: 芯片巨头靠股票激励留人：提前离职将损失百万美元
item.description:
According to Business Insider, U.S. chipmakers Nvidia, AMD, and Broadcom are reinforcing "golden handcuffs" through large-scale stock incentive plans to cope with the high-end talent competition brought by the AI boom. 据《商业内幕》报道，美国芯片制造商英伟达、AMD 和博通正在通过大规模股票激励计划加固「黄金手铐」，以应对人工智能热潮带来的高端人才竞争。

The report points out that the Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) issued by these companies to employees have significantly appreciated in value over the past two years due to soaring stock prices. 报道指出，这些公司向员工发放的限制性股票单位（RSU）在过去两年因股价飙升而大幅增值。

In 2023, an Nvidia employee's $488,000 equity award is now worth over $2.2 million; another Broadcom employee's $66,000 in RSUs received in 2023 has now risen to approximately $265,000. 2023 年，一名英伟达员工获得的 48.8 万美元股权奖励，如今价值已超过 220 万美元；另一名博通员工在 2023 年获得的 6.6 万美元 RSU，如今已升至约 26.5 万美元。

Since RSUs are unlocked gradually over several years, employees who leave early will lose unvested portions. This mechanism effectively reduces employee turnover. 由于 RSU 需在数年内逐步解锁，员工若提前离职将损失未归属部分，这一机制有效降低了人员流动率。

Nvidia disclosed in its annual sustainability report that its employee attrition rate has decreased from 5.3% in 2023 to 2.5% in 2025. Broadcom also stated that its global voluntary turnover rate last year was 6.2%, which is below the industry average. 英伟达在年度可持续发展报告中披露，其员工流失率已从 2023 年的 5.3% 降至 2025 年的 2.5%。博通也表示，其去年全球自愿离职率为 6.2%，低于行业平均水平。

Meanwhile, a fierce talent war is erupting in Silicon Valley. 与此同时，硅谷正爆发激烈的人才争夺战。

Meta has recently attracted attention for continuously "poaching" talent with high salaries, having "lured away" at least 8 core researchers from OpenAI in just one week, offering a compensation package of "$300 million over 4 years, with $100 million in the first year." Meta 近期连续以高薪「挖人」引发关注，仅一周内就从 OpenAI「挖走」至少 8 名核心研究员，并开出「4 年 3 亿美元、首年 1 亿美元」的薪酬方案。

Several Apple AI experts have also successively moved to Meta. Chip giants have coincidentally launched stock incentive mechanisms like RSUs, likely intending to resist the impact of external high-salary poaching through "golden handcuffs." 苹果多名 AI 大牛也相继跳槽至 Meta。芯片巨头不约而同推出 RSU 等股票激励机制，或意在通过「黄金手铐」抵御外部高薪挖角的冲击。

item.title: 京东启动「国民好车」交付中心招募
item.guid: 京东启动「国民好车」交付中心招募
item.description:
Yesterday, JD.com posted on social media, announcing the official launch of its "National Good Car" delivery center recruitment plan. 昨天，京东在社交平台发文，宣布正式启动「国民好车」交付中心招募计划。

Following the previous launch of "National Good Car" in collaboration with CATL and GAC Group, this plan further expands its cooperation map, aiming to build a nationwide sales, delivery, and after-sales service network by integrating 4S stores, car delivery/service centers, and large after-sales service outlets. 该计划继此前联合宁德时代、广汽集团推出「国民好车」后，再次扩展合作版图，旨在通过整合 4S 店、汽车交付/服务中心及大型售后服务门店，构建覆盖全国的销售、交付及售后服务网络。

According to the recruitment conditions, franchisees must have experience in sales, delivery, and after-sales service for mainstream automotive brands, and meet the OEM's standard requirements for delivery and after-sales functional areas. JD.com will provide partners with delivery authorization, certification, supply chain support, and online and offline marketing resources. 根据招募条件，加盟方需具备主流汽车品牌销售、交付及售后经验，并符合主机厂标准的交付及售后功能区要求。京东将为合作伙伴提供交付授权、认证授牌、供应链支持及线上线下营销资源。

Meanwhile, JD Auto Care simultaneously launched the "Auto Care Partner Program" and announced an investment of 1 billion resources to initiate the "One County, One Store" strategy, focusing on deploying in county-level markets. 与此同时，京东养车同步推出「养车合伙人计划」，并宣布投入 10 亿资源发起「一县一店」战略，重点布局县域市场。

The plan offers franchise fees as low as 0 yuan, 12 months of management fee waivers, and standardized store setup, operations, training, and marketing support, further expanding the automotive aftermarket. 该计划提供低至 0 元加盟、12 个月管理费减免，以及标准化建店、运营、培训和营销支持，进一步拓展车后市场。

item.title: 💡 R 星母公司 CEO：AI 是「好事」，但永远不具备创造力
item.guid: 💡-R-星母公司-CEO：AI-是「好事」，但永远不具备创造力
item.description:
According to PC Gamer, Strauss Zelnick, Chairman and CEO of Take-Two, Rockstar's parent company, stated at the Paley International Council Summit held yesterday in Menlo Park, California, that while AI can bring efficiency improvements to game development, its essence is a "language model combining large datasets and computing power," unable to truly create hit works or demonstrate creativity. 据 PC Gamer 报道，R 星母公司 Take-Two 董事长兼 CEO Strauss Zelnick 在昨日于加州门洛帕克举行的 Paley International Council Summit 上表示，人工智能虽能为游戏开发带来效率提升，但其本质是「大数据集与计算能力结合的语言模型」，无法真正创造热门作品或展现创造力。

Zelnick emphasized that AI's predictive models rely on existing data, thus "datasets are retrospective, while creativity is prospective." He pointed out that AI performs well when it has a large amount of clear data, but its capabilities are limited when data is insufficient, hence "AI appears forward-looking, but in reality, it is merely a predictive model." Zelnick 强调，AI 的预测模型依赖既有数据，因此「数据集是回顾性的，而创造力则是前瞻性的」。他指出，AI 在拥有大量清晰数据时表现出色，但在数据不足时能力有限，因此「AI 看似前瞻，实则只是预测模型」。

He further described the current AI craze as "a combination of metadata and parlor tricks," predicting that over time, the public will gradually get used to its existence, much like the acceptance process for Google back then. Nevertheless, Zelnick did not deny AI's value, calling it "a good thing for all industries," but explicitly stated that it "will not reproduce or create genius, nor will it create blockbusters." 他进一步形容当前的 AI 热潮为「元数据与戏法的结合」，并预测随着时间推移，公众会逐渐习惯其存在，就像当年对 Google 的接受过程一样。尽管如此，Zelnick 并未否认 AI 的价值，他称其为「对所有行业而言都是一件好事」，但明确表示「不会重现或创造天才，也不会制造爆款」。

Regarding employment impact, Zelnick believes that AI will not reduce jobs but rather increase them. He cited agriculture as an example, pointing out that in 1865, 65% of the U.S. workforce was engaged in agriculture, whereas today, only 2% of the workforce can meet domestic and international demand, and society has not experienced an employment crisis as a result. 在就业影响方面，Zelnick 认为 AI 不会减少岗位，反而会增加。他以农业为例指出，1865 年美国 65% 的劳动力从事农业，而如今仅有 2% 的劳动力即可满足国内外需求，社会并未因此出现就业危机。

Overall, Zelnick's stance is neither a complete denial nor blind optimism, but rather an emphasis on AI's limitations and auxiliary value, highlighting its potential in terms of efficiency rather than as a substitute for creativity. 整体来看，Zelnick 的立场既非全盘否定，也非盲目乐观，而是强调 AI 的局限性与辅助价值，凸显其在效率层面的潜力，而非创造力的替代。

item.title: 3999 元起，一加 15 正式发布
item.guid: 3999-元起，一加-15-正式发布
item.description:
Last night, OnePlus held a new product launch event in Xi'an, officially releasing the OnePlus 15. The new phone is equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition and is among the first to feature ColorOS 16. 昨晚，一加在西安召开新品发布会，正式发布一加 15，新机搭载第五代骁龙 8 至尊版，并首批搭载 ColorOS 16。

Key selling points: 主要卖点：

  • 165Hz 6.78-inch "Oriental Screen 3.0," supporting 1nit dark night display, 2772 × 1272 resolution, and a 1.15mm four-equal-bezel design; 165Hz 6.78 英寸「东方屏 3.0」，支持 1nit 暗夜显示，2772 × 1272 分辨率，1.15mm 四等边设计；

  • Thickness 8.18mm, weight 211g; 厚度 8.18mm，重量 211g；
  • Symmetrical dual speakers, 3D ultrasonic fingerprint recognition, USB 3.2 Gen1, customizable buttons, supports N79 band. 对称式双扬声器、3D 超声波指纹识别、USB 3.2 Gen1、自定义按键、支持 N79 频段。

Regarding pricing, the OnePlus 15 12GB + 256GB version is priced at 3999 yuan, with the highest option being 16GB + 1TB, priced at 5399 yuan. It officially goes on sale across all channels today at 10:00. 售价方面，一加 15 12GB + 256GB 版本售价 3999 元，最高可选 16GB + 1TB，售价 5399 元。今天 10:00 全渠道正式开售。

In addition, this launch event also introduced the OnePlus Ace 6 phone, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition, a 7800mAh battery, and 120W SuperVOOC fast charging, starting at 2599 yuan (12GB + 256GB), officially going on sale on Thursday. 此外，本次发布会还带来了一加 Ace 6 手机，搭载骁龙 8 至尊版、7800mAh 电池、120W 超级闪充，售价 2599 元起（12GB + 256GB），周四正式开售。

It is worth mentioning that a recent survey by Android Authority shows that the OnePlus 15 significantly leads the Samsung Galaxy S26 series in terms of overseas user anticipation. 值得一提的是，Android Authority 的一次最新调查显示，一加 15 在海外用户期待度上明显领先三星 Galaxy S26 系列。

In a poll launched by the media yesterday, over 4000 valid samples were collected, with 71% of respondents stating they were more excited about the OnePlus 15, while the proportion choosing the Galaxy S26 Ultra was 21%, and the S26 and S26 Plus received only 5% and 3% support respectively. 该媒体在昨日发起的投票中，共收集超过 4000 份有效样本，其中 71% 的受访者表示更期待 OnePlus 15，而选择 Galaxy S26 Ultra 的比例为 21%，S26 与 S26 Plus 分别仅获 5% 和 3% 的支持。

item.title: 三星三折叠或本周亮相
item.guid: 三星三折叠或本周亮相
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Samsung is expected to officially unveil its first tri-folding smartphone, the Galaxy Z TriFold, at the APEC CEO Summit held this week in Gyeongju, South Korea. 据 Android Authority 报道，三星预计将在本周于韩国庆州举行的 APEC CEO 峰会上正式发布其首款三折叠智能手机 Galaxy Z TriFold。

Industry sources say the model may officially go on sale in early November, with initial shipments of only about 50,000 units. The price is expected to be as high as approximately 4 million Korean Won (about 19,800 RMB), significantly higher than Samsung's existing foldable phone lineup. 业内消息称，该机型或将在 11 月初正式开售，首批出货量仅约 5 万台。售价预计高达约 400 万韩元（约合 19800 元人民币），远高于三星现有折叠屏产品线。

In terms of hardware, the Galaxy Z TriFold is expected to be equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition chip, rather than the latest fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition, and will feature a 200-megapixel camera, consistent with the Galaxy Z Fold 7. 在硬件方面，Galaxy Z TriFold 预计搭载高通骁龙 8 至尊版芯片，而非最新的第五代骁龙 8 至尊版，并配备 2 亿像素摄像头，与 Galaxy Z Fold 7 保持一致。

At the system level, the device will run One UI 8, optimized for the tri-fold form factor, allowing three applications to run simultaneously in portrait mode. 系统层面，该机将运行专为三折叠形态优化的 One UI 8，可在纵向模式下同时运行三款应用。

In terms of design, the Galaxy Z TriFold adopts an inward-folding "C-shaped" structure, differentiating itself from the "Z-shaped" folding method of the Huawei Mate XT. 设计上，Galaxy Z TriFold 采用向内折叠的「C 型」结构，与华为 Mate XT 的「Z 字形」折叠方式形成差异化。

item.title: 对标 AMD，英伟达 N1X 消费级 APU 或 2026 年中亮相
item.guid: 对标-AMD，英伟达-N1X-消费级-APU-或-2026-年中亮相
item.description:
According to TweakTown, Nvidia plans to launch Arm-based N1X and N1 processors in mid-2026, with the first products expected to be featured in a 16-inch Alienware gaming laptop set for release in Q1 2026. 据 TweakTown 报道，英伟达计划在 2026 年中期推出基于 Arm 架构的 N1X 与 N1 处理器，首批产品预计将搭载于外星人 2026 年第一季度发布的一款 16 英寸游戏本。

Sources reveal that the N1X and N1 processors are initially positioned for laptop platforms, but future desktop versions are not ruled out. This series of processors integrates high-performance GPUs, aiming to support 1080p and 1440p high-refresh-rate gaming, and achieve light 4K gaming experiences in some scenarios. 消息人士透露，N1X 与 N1 处理器最初定位于笔记本平台，但不排除未来会有桌面版本。该系列处理器集成高性能 GPU，目标是支持 1080p 与 1440p 高刷新率游戏，并在部分场景下实现轻度 4K 游戏体验。

Industry analysis suggests that the N1X will be positioned to compete with AMD's current Strix Halo APU. The latter features an RDNA 3.5 architecture Radeon 8060S GPU, capable of achieving smooth performance above 120Hz at 1080p and 1440p. 业内分析认为，N1X 的定位将对标 AMD 当前的 Strix Halo APU。后者采用 RDNA 3.5 架构的 Radeon 8060S GPU，能够在 1080p 与 1440p 下实现 120Hz 以上的流畅表现。

item.title: 余承东官宣新款享界 S9
item.guid: 余承东官宣新款享界-S9
item.description:
Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG, posted on Weibo yesterday, stating that the new Luxeed S9, a flagship model in the Harmony Intelligent Mobility Alliance's 9 series, will officially launch in November. 华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东昨日在微博发文表示，鸿蒙智行旗舰 9 系新款车型享界 S9 将于 11 月正式上市。

This model is positioned as a high-end smart electric sedan, representing the latest strategic move by Harmony Intelligent Mobility Alliance in its flagship product line. 该车型定位高端智能电动轿车，是鸿蒙智行在旗舰产品线上的最新布局。

For reference, the currently available Luxeed S9 offers both pure electric and extended-range versions, with CLTC comprehensive ranges of up to 816 km and 1355 km respectively. All models come standard with Huawei ADS assisted driving system, equipped with 3 solid-state LiDARs and a multi-sensor fusion solution; 作为参考，目前市售的享界 S9 提供纯电与增程两种版本，CLTC 综合续航分别最高可达 816 km 与 1355 km，全系标配华为 ADS 辅助驾驶系统，配备 3 颗固态激光雷达与多传感器融合方案；

Regarding the cockpit, the current Luxeed S9 is equipped with HarmonyOS 4 panoramic interconnection, a 32-inch smart projection giant screen system 2.0, rear zero-gravity seats, and a 23-speaker 7.1.4 surround sound system. 座舱方面，现款享界 S9 配备 HarmonyOS 4 全景互联、32 英寸智能投影巨幕系统 2.0、后排零重力座椅及 23 扬声器 7.1.4 环绕声系统。

item.title: 零跑 Lafa 5 预售发布会定档 11 月
item.guid: 零跑-Lafa-5-预售发布会定档-11-月
item.description:
Yesterday, Leapmotor's official Weibo announced that its new model, the "Leapmotor Lafa5," will hold a pre-sale launch event on November 7th at 19:00. 昨天，零跑汽车官方微博发文宣布，旗下新车型「零跑 Lafa5」将于 11 月 7 日 19:00 举行预售发布会。

The press conference will be themed "Define Your Own Path," emphasizing the product's focus on young user groups and highlighting personalized and liberal design philosophies. 此次发布会以「自己定义路」为主题，强调产品面向年轻用户群体，突出个性化与自由化的设计理念。

Leapmotor stated that the Lafa5 will be the brand's latest masterpiece, embodying its exploration in intelligence and design aesthetics. The official response to netizens emphasized "details that stand the test of time, enduring magnification after magnification." 零跑汽车表示，Lafa5 将作为品牌最新力作，承载其在智能化与设计美学上的探索。官方在回复网友时强调「耐看的细节，经得起放大再放大」。

According to Leapmotor's official website, the Lafa5 is positioned as a "high-value sports coupe," with an exterior design emphasizing sleekness and sportiness. Some models will be equipped with features such as an ultra-large panoramic sunroof, LiDAR, and left and right rearview mirror cameras. 据零跑汽车官网介绍，Lafa5 定位为「高颜值运动轿跑」，外观设计突出流线感与运动感，部分车型将配备超大全景天幕、激光雷达及左右后视镜摄像头等配置。

item.title: 豆包新款视频生成模式发布，速度快还更便宜
item.guid: 豆包新款视频生成模式发布，速度快还更便宜
item.description:
Yesterday, ByteDance's "Volcano Engine" officially launched the Doubao Video Generation Model 1.0 pro fast (Doubao-Seedance-1.0-pro-fast). 昨天，字节跳动旗下「火山引擎」正式上线 豆包视频生成模型 1.0 pro fast （Doubao-Seedance-1.0-pro-fast）。

According to the official introduction, this model builds upon the core advantages of the Seedance 1.0 pro model and achieves significant efficiency breakthroughs: generation speed is increased by up to approximately 3 times, and the price is directly reduced by 72%. Specifically: 官方介绍，该模型在继承 Seedance 1.0 pro 模型核心优势的基础上，实现了显著的效率突破： 生成速度最高提升约 3 倍，价格直降 72%。 具体来看：

    Seedance 1.0 pro fast significantly improves generation efficiency, completing a 5-second 720P video in just 10 seconds, approximately 3 times faster than the pro version. This meets scenarios requiring quick creative validation and high-frequency video creation in a short time;

    In terms of pricing, Seedance 1.0 pro fast achieves a highly competitive price reduction. The cost to generate a 5-second 1080P video is only 1.03 yuan, a direct 72% price drop compared to the pro version;

    Taking the example of producing 5 seconds of 1080P content for a cost of 10,000 yuan, the pro fast version can produce 9709 video clips, an efficiency increase of 3.56 times compared to the pro version, and 2.38 times compared to the lite version. Its overall efficiency also far surpasses mainstream domestic similar models.

It is worth mentioning that in terms of video generation quality, Seedance 1.0 pro fast specifically strengthens core capabilities such as instruction following, seamless multi-shot narration, and detail expression. Especially in the image-to-video direction, Seedance 1.0 pro fast has significant advantages in effect compared to global mainstream models like Veo 3.0 Fast, truly reducing costs and increasing efficiency while maintaining high-standard content output. 值得一提的是，在视频生成质量上，Seedance 1.0 pro fast 针对性强化了指令遵循、无缝多镜头叙事、细节表现力等核心能力。尤其在图生视频方向，Seedance 1.0 pro fast 相较 Veo 3.0 Fast 等全球主流模型有显著的效果优势，在真正降本提效的同时，仍然保持高水准的内容产出。

Currently, Seedance 1.0 pro fast has been officially launched on the Huoshan Ark platform. 目前，Seedance 1.0 pro fast 已正式上线火山方舟平台。

item.title: 中国 AI 新势力开源登顶 AA 榜单，成本仅为 Claude4.5 的 8%
item.guid: 中国-AI-新势力开源登顶-AA-榜单，成本仅为-Claude4.5-的-8%
item.description:
According to Sina Tech, domestic AI unicorn company MiniMax yesterday officially released and open-sourced its new generation large language model, MiniMax-M2. 据新浪科技报道，国内 AI 独角兽公司 MiniMax 稀宇极智昨天正式发布并开源其新一代文本大模型 MiniMax-M2。

The model's total score entered the global top five in the authoritative global evaluation list Artificial Analysis (AA), ranking first among open-source models, competing alongside international giants such as OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google. 该模型在全球权威测评榜单 Artificial Analysis（AA）中总分进入全球前五，并位列开源模型第一，与 OpenAI、Anthropic、Google 等国际巨头同台竞争。

In terms of cost, MiniMax-M2 demonstrates significant advantages. Its API is priced at $0.3 per million tokens for input (approximately 2.1 RMB) and $1.2 for output (approximately 8.4 RMB), offering inference services at around 100 TPS. This speed is nearly twice that of Claude Sonnet 4.5, while its price is only 8% of the latter. 在成本方面，MiniMax-M2 展现出显著优势。其 API 定价为每百万 Token 输入 0.3 美元（约 2.1 元人民币）、输出 1.2 美元（约 8.4 元人民币），并提供约 100 TPS 的推理服务，速度接近 Claude Sonnet 4.5 的两倍，而价格仅为后者的 8%。

Meanwhile, MiniMax announced the launch of M2-based Agent products, divided into "Lightning Efficient Mode" and "Pro Professional Mode," targeting lightweight Q&A and complex long-term tasks, respectively. The company stated, "We are currently offering MiniMaxAgent for free until our servers can no longer handle the load." 同时，MiniMax 宣布推出基于 M2 的 Agent 产品，分为「Lightning 高效模式」与「Pro 专业模式」，分别面向轻量级问答与复杂长程任务。 公司称，「我们目前在免费提供 MiniMaxAgent，直到我们的服务器撑不住为止」。

目前，MiniMax Agent 国内版已上线，在官网或手机端「MiniMax」App 通过手机号或微信登录即可体验。

item.title: Nike 推出全红配色 LeBron 23，致敬 2003 年 NBA 状元时刻
item.guid: Nike-推出全红配色-LeBron-23，致敬-2003-年-NBA-状元时刻
item.description:
According to Sneaker News, Nike will launch a new colorway of the Nike LeBron 23 "Best In Class" on November 7. 据 Sneaker News 报道，Nike 将于 11 月 7 日推出全新配色 Nike LeBron 23「Best In Class」。

Inspired by LeBron James' experience of being selected as the first overall pick in the 2003 NBA Draft, this sneaker features an all-red upper design with multiple detailed elements. 该款球鞋以 LeBron James 在 2003 年 NBA 选秀中以状元身份被选中的经历为灵感，采用全红鞋身设计，并辅以多处细节元素。

Official images show the upper covered with reflective graffiti patterns, including iconic elements like crowns; the heel features a bitten apple motif, symbolizing the classic "student's gift." LeBron's signature is printed on the tongue, and the Swoosh logo is rendered in gold. In terms of accessories, the shoes come with red and blue laces, custom packaging, and a special booklet. 官方图片显示，鞋面覆盖反光涂鸦图案，其中包括皇冠等标志性元素；鞋跟处印有被咬过的苹果图案，寓意「学生赠礼」的经典符号。鞋舌上印有 LeBron 签名，Swoosh 标志则以金色呈现。配件方面，鞋款附带红、蓝两色鞋带，并配有定制包装及特别册页。

The sneaker is priced at $210 (approximately 1500 RMB) and will be released on November 7, 2025, through official Nike channels and selected retailers. 该款球鞋定价 210 美元（约 1500 元人民币），将于 2025 年 11 月 7 日在 Nike 官方渠道及指定零售商发售。

item.title: 从神坛到考验：高端护肤品面临增长瓶颈
item.guid: 从神坛到考验：高端护肤品面临增长瓶颈
item.description:
According to Cosmetics Business News, the ultra-high-end skincare market is facing unprecedented challenges. Executives from several luxury brands, including La Mer and La Prairie, expressed widespread caution regarding the future of this previously fast-growing category in the latest industry report. 据《化妆品报》报道，超高端护肤品市场正面临前所未有的挑战。包括海蓝之谜（La Mer）、莱珀妮（La Prairie）在内的多家高端品牌高管在最新行业报告中表示，对这一曾经高速增长的品类未来普遍持谨慎态度。

Industry insiders point out that the overall slowdown in the luxury goods sector has impacted the skincare segment. 业内人士指出，奢侈品行业整体放缓已波及护肤领域。

J.P. Morgan analysis shows that approximately two-thirds of La Prairie's growth between 2018 and 2019 came from the Chinese market, but the impact of the pandemic led to a near halt in travel retail, causing the brand's performance to decline for three consecutive years until stabilizing in 2024. New CEO Estelle Le Tanguer emphasized that the brand is seeking transformation through scientific research transparency and optimized retail experiences. 摩根大通分析显示，莱珀妮在 2018 至 2019 年间约三分之二的增长来自中国市场，但疫情冲击导致旅游零售几近停滞，品牌业绩连续三年下滑，直至 2024 年才趋于稳定。新任首席执行官埃斯特尔·莱唐强调，品牌正通过科研透明度和零售体验优化寻求转型。

Meanwhile, the market structure is also changing. Analysts believe that for ultra-high-end skincare brands to remain competitive, they must maintain their luxury positioning while offering verifiable scientific efficacy and expanding into entry-level products to attract a broader consumer base. 与此同时，市场结构也在发生变化。分析人士认为，超高端护肤品牌若要保持竞争力，必须在维持奢华定位的同时，提供可验证的科学功效，并拓展入门级产品以吸引更广泛的消费群体。

Augustinus Bader CEO Charles Rosier stated that the brand's goal is not limited to "the top 1% of clients," but rather targets all consumers who believe in the product's effectiveness. 奥古斯汀·巴德（Augustinus Bader）CEO 查尔斯·罗西尔表示，品牌目标并非仅限于「1% 的顶级客户」，而是面向所有相信产品效果的消费者。

In the Asian market, traditional discount promotions have gradually become ineffective. Noble Panacea CEO Céline Talarabaza pointed out that over-reliance on discounts can erode brand trust. 在亚洲市场，折扣促销这一传统手段已逐渐失效。Noble Panacea CEO 塞琳 · 塔拉巴扎指出，过度依赖折扣会削弱品牌信任度。

item.title: 王者荣耀预热新英雄「六耳」
item.guid: 王者荣耀预热新英雄「六耳」
item.description:
Last night, the official Honor of Kings Weibo account announced that the game's new hero "Liu Er" is about to be launched, and more Chinese culture-themed characters will be introduced successively in 2026. 昨天晚间，《王者荣耀》官方在微博发文宣布，游戏全新英雄「六耳」即将上线，并将在 2026 年陆续推出更多中国文化主题角色。

It is reported that the newly announced character "Liu Er" is inspired by the Six-Eared Macaque from "Journey to the West," with its fated confrontation with Sun Wukong forming the core narrative. 据悉，此次公布的「六耳」形象源自《西游记》中的六耳猕猴，与孙悟空之间的宿命对决成为核心叙事。

The official statement indicates that this character will be a crucial part of the Chinese culture-themed hero series, with more related characters to be launched in the future to enhance the game's cultural essence and narrative depth. 官方表示，该角色将作为中国文化主题英雄系列的重要一环，未来还将有更多相关角色上线，以强化游戏的文化内涵与叙事深度。

item.title: 安德玛推出冬季系列，并官宣全新体能挑战赛
item.guid: 安德玛推出冬季系列，并官宣全新体能挑战赛
item.description:
Recently, the new winter collection, centered around the UNDER ARMOUR ColdGear winter training compression shirt, has been launched. 近日，以 UNDER ARMOUR 安德玛ColdGear冬训紧身衣为核心产品的冬季系列全新上线。

This series aims to protect athletes from the constraints of low temperatures, transforming winter challenges into training advantages, and providing a scientific winter sports apparel solution: from the core UA ColdGear winter training compression gear, to the UA ColdGear base layer series specifically designed for cold protection, and then to the UA Limitless Hot Winter series down jackets that provide robust outer protection, helping athletes focus on their winter training, keeping their bodies dry and warm. 该系列旨在守护运动家不受低温束缚，将冬季的挑战转化为训练的优势，提供了一个科学的冬季运动穿搭方案：从核心的 UA ColdGear 冬训紧身衣，到专为御寒设计的 UA ColdGear 打底系列，再到提供外层坚实防护的 UA Limitless 热冬系列羽绒服，助力运动家在冬训中能够心无旁骛，保持身体干爽与温暖。

In addition, Under Armour announced the UA NEXT COMBINE Physical Challenge, providing athletes with a scientific progression path. 此外，安德玛官宣了 UA NEXT COMBINE 体能挑战赛，为运动家提供科学的进阶路径。

The competition will combine the UA NEXT Youth Elite Athlete platform with the COMBINE professional physical assessment system, focusing on six major physical elements: speed, explosiveness, agility, endurance, cognitive ability, and jumping ability. It will feature eight individual tests and innovatively introduce a "Hexagon Arena" team format, where athletes will receive exclusive individual and team data reports. 赛事将结合 UA NEXT 青少年精英运动家平台与 COMBINE 专业体测体系，围绕速度、爆发力、敏捷、耐力、认知力、跳跃能力六大体能要素，设置了八项个人测试，并创新引入「六边形竞技场」团体赛制，运动家们将获得专属的个人与团队数据报告。

item.title: 《旺铺开业指南》杀青
item.guid: 《旺铺开业指南》杀青
item.description:
Recently, the film "Guide to a Prosperous Shop Opening" officially announced the wrap of filming and simultaneously released its first trailer. 近日，电影《旺铺开业指南》官宣正式杀青，并同步释出首支预告片。

The film tells the story of pastry chef Bai Yang, who, when at a dead end, rents a haunted house and recruits three distinctive staff members to transform it into a popular dessert shop. 影片讲述甜品师白央在走投无路之际，租下一处凶宅并招募三位特质鲜明的店员，将其改造为网红甜品店的故事。

According to official introductions, the film blends comedy, suspense, and horror elements, featuring the contrasting setting of a "haunted house turned dessert shop," emphasizing a youthful creative team and novel narrative attempts. 官方介绍称，该片融合喜剧、悬疑与惊悚元素，主打「凶宅变甜品店」的反差设定，强调年轻化的主创阵容与新颖的叙事尝试。

item.title: 《澎湖海战》发布先导预告
item.guid: 《澎湖海战》发布先导预告
item.description:
The naval warfare film "Battle of Penghu" released its "Unifying Taiwan is Irresistible" teaser trailer and poster yesterday. This is the second major release from the filmmakers on the same day, following the launch of the tribute song "Penghu" single and MV in the morning. 海战题材电影《澎湖海战》于昨天发布了「统一台湾 势不可挡」版先导预告及海报。这是继当天上午推出致敬曲《澎湖》单曲及 MV 后，片方在同日再次释出的重磅物料。

It is reported that "Battle of Penghu" began filming in Quanzhou, Fujian in July 2024 and wrapped up in Wuxi, Jiangsu in December of the same year. The film then entered a long post-production phase, and its cast and core information were only revealed to the public with this latest material release. 据悉，《澎湖海战》早在 2024 年 7 月于福建泉州开机，并于同年 12 月在江苏无锡关机。此后影片进入长期后期制作阶段，直至此次物料发布才首次对外公布演员阵容和核心信息。

In terms of plot, the film focuses on the historical event of 1683, when Emperor Kangxi ordered Fujian Naval Admiral Shi Lang to lead forces to attack Penghu, defeat the Taiwan Navy, and achieve the peaceful unification of Taiwan. 剧情方面，影片聚焦 1683 年康熙皇帝命福建水师提督施琅率军进攻澎湖，击败台湾水师，实现台湾和平统一的历史事件。

In the trailer, Wang Xueqi plays 63-year-old Shi Lang, and Jackson Yee plays 27-year-old Emperor Kangxi. The film is expected to be 144 minutes long, covering genres of war, action, and history, and will be released in China in 2026. 预告片中，王学圻饰演 63 岁的施琅，易烊千玺饰演 27 岁的康熙皇帝。影片时长预计 144 分钟，类型涵盖战争、动作与历史，将于 2026 年在中国上映。

item.title: Netflix 惊悚新剧《怪物》登顶全球收视榜
item.guid: Netflix-惊悚新剧《怪物》登顶全球收视榜
item.description:
According to Douban Movies, Netflix's thriller-horror series "Monsters: The Story of Ed Gein" quickly topped the platform's global viewership chart since its launch on October 3, 2025, garnering 12.2 million views in its first weekend. 据豆瓣电影报道，Netflix 惊悚恐怖剧集《怪物：艾德·盖恩的故事》自 2025 年 10 月 3 日上线以来，迅速登顶该平台全球收视榜，首个周末即获得 1220 万次观看。

This series is the third season of the "Monsters" franchise, centering on Ed Gein, one of the most notorious serial killers in American criminal history. 该剧为《怪物》系列的第三季，以美国犯罪史上臭名昭著的连环杀手艾德·盖恩为核心人物。

The "Monsters" series has achieved phenomenal success since its first season, "The Story of Jeffrey Dahmer," in 2022, becoming one of the most-watched series in Netflix history. 《怪物》系列自 2022 年首季《杰夫瑞·达莫的故事》起便获得现象级成功，成为 Netflix 历史上观看人数最多的剧集之一。

This season continues the biographical crime drama format, focusing on Gein's upbringing and psychological distortion, and using a "meta-commentary" approach through film and television culture to reveal his profound influence on classic horror films such as "Psycho," "The Silence of the Lambs," and "The Texas Chain Saw Massacre." 本季延续传记型犯罪剧集的模式，聚焦盖恩的成长环境与心理扭曲过程，并通过影视文化的「元评论」手法，揭示其对《惊魂记》《沉默的羔羊》《德州电锯杀人狂》等经典恐怖片的深远影响。
